item.name: Decor candy
item.description: A leftover decor candy from last Christmas.

item.description: A chocolate bar made of finest chocolate.

item.description: A highly poisoned red scorpion stinger.

item.description: A bug's leg. Mostly used for alchemy.

item.description: A really sharp knife Don't hurt yourself!

item.description: A shirt made of hardened leather.

item.name: Coin bag
item.description: A bag used to transport coins in it. If you own it you can take more coins with you.

item.name: Milk
item.description: A fresh litre of ice cold milk. Note: Cool people drink milk!

item.name: Boots
item.description: Some robust boots, ideal for travelling.

item.name: Iron arrow
item.description: A hard arrow made of iron.

item.name: Miner gloves
item.description: Gloves used by miners; very useful.

item.name: Bottle of sand
item.description: A bottle with sand in it.

item.name: Silk headband
item.description: A cool headband made of silk.

item.name: Forest bow
item.description: A bow usually used to hunt.

item.description: A shirt suitable for desert trips.

item.name: Halberd
item.description: A weapon usually carried by guards.

item.description: An axe usually used by blacksmiths.

item.description: A sword with a very sharp, curved, single-edged blade.

item.name: Petal
item.description: A petal from an evil flower.

item.name: Bone knife
item.description: A knife masterly carved out of a bone.

item.name: Setzer
item.description: A knife named after a famous gambler.

item.name: Scimitar
item.description: A sword with a heavy, curved, single-edged blade.

item.name: Beheader
item.description: An oddly designed sword especially made for beheading enemies.

item.name: Staff of life
item.description: A staff that increases healing magic.

item.name: Staff of fire
item.description: A staff that increases fire magic.

item.name: Staff of ice
item.description: A staff that increases ice magic.

item.name: Broad Sword
item.description: A two handed sword with a very broad blade.

item.name: Long Sword
item.description: A sword with a long and agile blade.

item.description: A dagger with a long and thin blade.

item.description: A light sword made for duels.

item.description: A heavy spear with a wooden pole.

item.description: A light spear with an iron pole.

item.name: Heavy Pike

item.name: Fire Sword
item.description: A magical sword enchanted with the power of fire.

item.description: Legendary shield that is said to save queens and rule waves.

item.name: Leather Shield
item.description: A shield made of leather on a wooden frame.

item.name: Knight Shield
item.description: A high quality shield used by knights.

item.name: Meat Cleaver
item.description: A butchers tool that also makes a nice one handed battle axe.

item.name: White fur
item.description: A patch of white, fluffy fur.

item.description: Feeler of a lamp snake that glows in the dark.

item.name: Hard spike
item.description: The hard spike of a slain monster.

item.description: No-one knows why pinkies have these antennas on their heads.

item.description: A helmet made out of a pumpkin.

item.name: Goggles
item.description: Goggles designed to take care of your eyes.

item.name: Eyepatch
item.description: What really makes you a pirate.

item.name: Scythe
item.description: Usually used for farming but also usable as a weapon. Slow but deadly.

item.description: A shirt made of chains. It weights a lot but offers excellent protection.
